Revamped Tick Trades from Binary.com

Jun 1, 2014

With the latest upgrade to our trading interface, we have redesigned the way the tick trades work. Tick trades may now be purchased on “Randoms” via the “Rise/Fall” section for a minimum duration of 5 ticks or a maximum duration of 10 ticks. Simply purchase a tick trade as you would any other trade with more flexibility and most importantly, no delays!

Read more...

Short-term Touch/No Touch Trades Are Now Available

May 21, 2014

Great news! Touch/No Touch trades on selected Indices are now available with a minimum duration of 1 day. The flexibility of choosing a duration as little as 1 day puts you further in control, giving you a broader range of options when purchasing your trade.

Read more...

Binary.com Pulls the Plug on the Legacy Charts

Apr 10, 2014

This move comes as a result of the recent upgrade to our charting package, which we are pleased to say was very well-received by our customers. Effective from the 14 April 2014, the “Legacy Charts” will be brought down, to make room for our new and improved “Live Charts” and the “Java application” which you can download right here.

Read more...

More flexibility, less complexity

Apr 8, 2014

Timing and flexibility mean everything when you’re trying to get in on a trade. Now we have two great features that will help you zero in on your perfect trade.

Read more...

Historical Prices for Random Markets Now Available

Apr 1, 2014

Read more...
